item.title: Paper Note — MapReduce
item.description: Overview If you are a software engineer, you must hear a tech concept — “MapReduce”. It is quite popular in the processing dataset on the large scale cluster. It was created by Google in 2004. With the development of technology, maybe Google has a new awesome method, but MapReduce has become an important sample for learning the principle of the distributed system. This blog is a kind of paper note. Because I am learning the 6.
